Store: Liquid Latex Fashions
Average Rating: 4.0

Review Text: it does too smell. It works but it stinks.
Review Title: Three Stars
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: PUEEN Nail Stamp Plate Synthetic Leather Case Holder Organizer Nail Image Stamping Plates Case - Pick Your Color (Pink)-BH000171
Review Date: 2015/09/18
Store: PUEEN
Product Description: ['We have created these mini nail image stamping plates holder for your travel and daily storage needs.  Qty:1 Case Color: Synthetic leather with colors available in white, pink and hot pink Case Size: 3 x 3 1/4 inches Slot Size: 6.5cm x 7cm Style: 14 double-side pages Capacity: Each case has 28 slots Page Finish: Matte, see-through vinyl pages  Cases only (image plates are sold separately)']
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 0.7 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '756438335749 852664492888 794168069619', 'Manufacturer': 'PUEEN'}
Review Text: Helpful to have this case to keep my stamp discs in order.
Review Title: Five Stars
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ibd Just Gel Polish Patchwork 0.5 oz
Review Date: 2015/09/18
Store: IBD
Product Description: ["Applied like a polish, but cured in LED or UV light, ibd's Just Gel Polish provides high shine and long wear. With a 100% pure gel formula, JGP applies like a polish but cures in an LED or UV light. Removal is simple, safe, and fast. Available in over 200 shades. Mix well. Apply a thin coat of Gel Polish covering the free edge of the nail, avoiding the cuticle area and cure 2 minutes under UV Lamp or cure for 30 seconds under LED Lamp. Repeat process for a second coat. Dipentaerythrityl Pentaacrylate, Tetrahydrofurfuryl Methacrylate, Sucrose Benzoate, Isobornyl Acrylate, Acrylates/Acrylamide Copolymer, Di-HEMA Trimethylhexyl Dicarbamate, Trimethylolpropane Triacrylate, Hydroxycyclohexyl Phenyl Ketone, Benzoyl Isopropanol, Ethyl Trimethylbenzoyl Phenylphosphinate, Polyester-3, Silica, Aluminum Hydroxide, Barium Sulfate, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Violet 2 (CI 60725), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)"]
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'IBD', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Grey', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.9 x 1.9 x 3.8 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '56849', 'UPC': '798813148872 039013568498', 'Manufacturer': 'IBD Beauty'}
Review Text: I love IBD just gel for my salon. This is a salon use only product and I do not recommend for do it yourself consumers but people will do what they will do. This is a gorgeous lavender gray color.
Review Title: I love IBD just gel for my salon
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Anself 110V Suction Dust Collector Machine Vacuum Cleaner Nail Art Salon Tool
Review Date: 2017/06/05
Store: Anself
Average Rating: 2.7
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '12.4 x 7.6 x 5.3 inches; 1.95 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'H12519P-US-F2', 'UPC': '706551127448'}
Review Text: These are garbage. The bags cannot complete a true seal, so dust just flies out around where the bag fits at the fan. These to not have a gasket seal to secure the actual fan to the hand rest, so more dust comes flying out of that section. You will be cleaning the dust up from the table and your face just the same. Because without a seal for the bag and the fan itself, there is no way to stop the dust from going everywhere.
Review Title: Not worth a penny.
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Makartt Nail Suction Dust Collector New No-spilling Filter 40W Strong Power
Review Date: 2018/08/24
Store: Makartt
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.47 x 9.84 x 3.86 inches; 2.63 Pounds'}
Review Text: Hands down the best dust collector I have ever bought. This doesn’t do anything for fumes, but that’s not an issue for me. It actually pulls the dust down and doesn’t allow it to escape through the sides or bottom like dust fans with bags. It’s louder than some but the noise is still one you can easily talk over. The filter is simple to remove and clean and doesn’t need to be replaced, as again this is not an odor air purifier, just a dust machine.
Review Title: Highly recommend.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a strong inclination towards cosmetic and beauty products, particularly for nail care and body paint applications. The individual consistently rates products positively, averaging above 4 stars, indicating a genuine appreciation for quality. However, there are instances of dissatisfaction, especially regarding odor issues in certain body paint products, hinting at a preference for low-odor formulations.

Key themes include a focus on functionality and organization, as suggested by the purchase of a nail stamp plate holder and the use of dust collectors, both indicating an organized approach to beauty routines and a need to manage application tools efficiently. Quality in products is prioritized, particularly with gel polishes and reliable dust collectors, which are crucial in professional settings.

Price sensitivity appears moderate, with purchases concentrated on well-rated products that likely balance cost with performance. The individual is also discerning about effectiveness, evidenced by a stark contrast in satisfaction levels with dust collectors, favoring those that performed as advertised.

Overall, this person values high-quality, efficient beauty and cosmetic products that facilitate professional application while minimizing unpleasant sensory experiences.

target_interaction.title: Doesn’t look nearly as vibrant.
target_interaction.text: This stuff is nothing like it says it is. I am an experienced tech and I use other brands of cat eye gel polish. These just didn’t show well with the black background. They also don’t respond to the magnet as well as other lines. It had to be returned. It’s not useable for paying clients.
